news.title: UNH helps lead the way for campuses to measure their nitrogen footprints
news.summary: DURHAM, N.H. - Sustainability leadership efforts at the University of New Hampshire have contributed to a groundbreaking initiative to measure and reduce the nitrogen footprint left behind by campus activities like food waste and energy consumption.
